date_range.date_range_comment: Activate the date filter (format: YYYY-MM-DD). None can be used for either start or end

debug.show_SQL_comment: Display the SQL queries executed by the program

compute.compute_comment: Create the report counting the number of entries per category

database.merge_WAL_file_to_DB_comment: Opens the DB in merge mode, synching the DB with the WAL file

amcache.csv_filename_comment: CSV file created by E.Zimmerman's AmCache tool with the unassociated entries of the AmCache
